OOC: Fine for me! =)

The new robot was stunned. He had just woke up for what seemed like an 
eternity... And there he was, on an unknown planet, greeted by.. a 
descendant?!?

?????: Huh... Hi, I guess... Mustex, is it? I'm Thunderstorm!
(he took Mustex's hand and shook it) Just where are we? Is the war 
over? Who's winning? And how come you are an autobot descendant? Oh, 
and I have to report to Prime! You know where I could find him?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> OOC: Just wanted you to know I had my weapons approved by Hugar. So 
> there's nothing wrong with this. And the reason I asked you to do 
that 
> was so no one would say I was posting for someone elses char.
> 
> Mustex extends his hand in greeting.
> 
> Mustex:  Hello I'm Mustex. I'm hoping your a friend. My guess would 
be 
> that you're an Autobot.  I'm a Maximal.  We're Autobot descendants. 
I 
> think you've been in there a looooooooong time.
>

hurts...
